goals.description: Implement @email operator for email sending and management
goals.success_criteria: Emails can be sent via SMTP with attachments, HTML content, and proper error handling

goals.description: Implement @sms operator for SMS messaging via various providers
goals.success_criteria: SMS messages can be sent via Twilio, AWS SNS, or other SMS gateways

goals.description: Implement @slack operator for Slack integration and messaging
goals.success_criteria: Slack messages can be sent to channels, DMs, and webhooks with rich formatting
